TEXT.TITLE: HAMILTON OIL <HAML> SAYS RESERVES RISE
TEXT.BODY: Hamilton Oil Corp said reserves at the end of 1986 were 59.8 mln barrels of oil and 905.5 billion cubic feet of natural gas, or 211 mln barrels equivalent, up 10 mln equivalent barrels from a year before. Reuter
